original_texts.subject: Ptychagnostidae
original_texts.src: ¿Cuál era la familia de Ptychagnostidae?
original_texts.rephrase: ¿Cuál era la familia de Ptychagnostidae?
original_texts.loc: ¿Cuál es un efecto del efecto halo del equipo??
original_texts.loc_ans: cuando un individuo nota que la persona en la fotografía es atractiva, está bien arreglada y vestida apropiadamente, asume, usando una heurística mental, que la persona en la fotografía es una buena persona basándose en las reglas del concepto social de ese individuo.

portability.New Question: ¿Cuál es el nombre común de la familia de insectos a la que se cree erróneamente que pertenece Ptychagnostidae?

translated_texts.src: What was the family of Ptychagnostidae?
translated_texts.rephrase: What was the family of Ptychagnostidae?
translated_texts.loc: What is an effect of the halo effect of the equipment?
translated_texts.loc_ans: when an individual notices that the person in the photograph is attractive, well groomed and appropriately dressed, he or she assumes, using a mental heuristic, that the person in the photograph is a good person based on the rules of that individual's social concept.
translated_texts.new_question: What is the common name of the insect family to which Ptychagnostidae is mistakenly believed to belong?

en_texts.src: Which was the family of Ptychagnostidae?
en_texts.rephrase: What was the family of Ptychagnostidae?
en_texts.loc: nq question: which is one effect of the team halo effect?
en_texts.loc_ans: when an individual noticing that the person in the photograph is attractive, well groomed, and properly attired, assumes, using a mental heuristic, that the person in the photograph is a good person based upon the rules of that individual’s social concept
en_texts.new_question: What is the common name of the insect family that Ptychagnostidae is mistakenly believed to be a part of?
